content: use the crochet wattle stitch corner 2 corner with a super easy border to create this square crochet blanket a step by step video tutorial is available for this crochet blanket pattern c2c wattle stitch crochet blanket pattern tutorial 1 > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out pattern info stitches used in this pattern single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet 2 together finished size 44 long x 44 wide hook size 6 00mm yarn 1620 yards of red heart super saver ombre yarn 3 1/2 skeins in deep teal 1 https //youtu be/j4xpr7gtppi 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
